entries.entry: We went over the basics of what conditionals and loops looked like and did some practice code.
Introduction to Flexbox, did practice problems and played Flexbox Froggy.
Did a code-along and created our index page and CSS for the Martin's Aquarium project. Also hashed out the hello-world-coatimundi travel website (first group project).
Covered more about the DOM, adding to what we learning in Foundations Class.
